page.title: 17CHIRNSIDE CIVIC WEEK
page.content: There is a treasure hunt, which is very popular, bowling, discos which are always a success, and a grand concert which attracts a full house. Each year during the week there is a penalty-kick competition for juniors and seniors, and for the first time, this year a girl won the senior penalty-kick competition. The torchlight procession draws people from all around. To round off the festivities a Gala Dance is held for the whole community on Saturday night. A raffle is held there with a prize of Â£100. So ends the highly successful and increasingly popular Civic Week.
